roleset.name: defrost
roleset.note: UNTHAW-V NOTES: Frames file for 'unthaw' loosely based on frames file for 'thaw'. (from unthaw.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: arg1 subject
example.text: Insects there were [*T*-2] on the world , but [they]-1 were frozen [*-1] solid during the night , [*-1] only to revive and unthaw in the morning sun .
